reviews.review: sim, recomendo esse jogo. Ele só me fez quebrar meu monitor, me separar da minha mulher e perder o emprego... Tirando tudo isso ele é um exelente jogo e não me arrependo de compra-lo. Boa noite!

游戏是好玩 孤儿也蛮多

Run around shooting people, lucky shots abound but you'll get them too every once in awhile, grenade physics a little off sometimes and the explosions on a -timer- instead of impact which takes getting used too. I am not very good at it but sometimes i get people lol If you are not very good you will get kicked (don't take it personally) maps are cool it's a okay game if you want to run around and fight people but mostly it's running and getting head shotted from across the map by a strung out wanna be cell phone kid who just downloaded some cheats and probably watched that god awful hacker movie and feel like they are apart of something but really just suck like everyone else when they turn them off (very depressing if you ask me)! I would love to see first round be knives only 2nd round pistols and then you can unlock whatever, but it's fine either way as i just like running around and shooting the guns! xD
Jogo otimo mas as vezes azia bastante

I really like counter strike. My favorite part is playing with people from different continents with really good pings and great communication skills. I also really appreciate the incredible ranking system that works so well. Finally the best part about CSGO is the Anti-cheat. Valve really did a great job with CSGO and i look forward to spending more money on skins.

Всем привет, хочу сказать я играю в Counter-Strike: Global Offensive 1 раз в своей жизни и хочу сказать- это 1 из самых лучших шутеров во всём мире. Советую этот шутер тем кто не играл в него не когда в своей жизни. В Counter-Strike: Global Offensive мне понравился геймплей, анимации, скины и карты.
真的好耐玩，跟朋友一起玩更好玩！

Great concept, but ruined by the most toxic community I've ever seen. You get kicked for losing a 1v4, there's a cheater in almost every match unless you pay, and to be a viable player you need to spend hours memorizing grenade throws on every map or just get kicked by your teammates.

Watching pro games is pretty fun though...
